title: Is anyone else struggling with React?
content: For some reason, I'm just not understanding it.  How far do we break down components?  Should each HTML element be it's own component?  This seems super confusing.
author: frogman

comments.details: I think you just need some more practice.  Components don't need to be broken down nearly that much.  Just take into account how you might reuse components, and where does the state/logic live in the application that deals with those componenents.  Keep at it!
comments.author: glass-half-full
